message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to discuss selling you this product. I believe it's very valuable and could benefit you greatly.  To start, I'm offering it to you for $11,000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.
I understand your budget considerations, Bob. How about we meet halfway at $10,250?  This price reflects the true value of the product while acknowledging your interest.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. Would you be willing to consider $9,800? I'm willing to meet you halfway from your previous offer.
